idea-plugin.name: Lotus Islands Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Lotus Islands Theme

The beloved Lotus color scheme, beautifully adapted with several enhancements for the new JetBrains Islands UI (2025.3+). Based on the original Lotus Theme from Brian Lai.

Includes a dark theme and light theme.

  • Lotus Islands Dark
  • Lotus Islands Light
